structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text:
An application for registration or renewal of registration must be accompanied by a fee in the following amount:
An initial application for registration fee determined by the office, not to exceed three hundred dollars ($300);
An annual renewal fee determined by the office, not to exceed three hundred dollars ($300); or
An application for registration fee based upon certification of registration or licensure issued by another state determined by the office, not to exceed two hundred fifty dollars ($250).
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 219, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 8, effective June 24, 2003.
